name: df-fzo
body: |- wceq(cfzo, cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cz, co(cv(s0), cfz, co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1))))
comment: Define a function generating sets of integers using a _half-open_ range. Read ` ( M ..^ N ) ` as the integers from ` M ` up to, but not including, ` N ` ; contrast with ` ( M ... N ) ` ~ df-fz , which includes ` N ` . Not including the endpoint simplifies a number of formulas related to cardinality and splitting; contrast ~ fzosplit with ~ fzsplit , for instance. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Aug-2015.)
